item.title: 马斯克的政治倒退让 X 公司开始寻找相关性
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将探讨埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）退出政治舞台的意愿，以及这对他的社交网络 X 意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner looks at Elon Musk’s stated desire to pull back from politics and what that may mean for his social network, X.】

item.title: 从财富管理到旅游业，海湾地区重新认识自己的作用
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天，我们将探讨海湾地区在世界上的角色如何发生转变。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at ways that the Gulf region’s role in the world is shifting. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 关税申报负担、审计审查拖垮美国进口商
item.description: 注意了，美国国税局审计员。美国海关和边境保护局的关税检查员们正逐渐成为你们最害怕的联邦监管人员，他们试图确保美国企业正确提交文件。【原文：Attention, IRS auditors. Tariff inspectors from US Customs and Border Protection are gaining on you in the race to be the most-feared federal regulators trying to ensure American businesses file paperwork correctly.】

item.title: 风险投资行业从未如此艰难
item.description:
新风险投资公司的资金急剧下降，给新公司带来了巨大压力。【原文：

Funding for new VC firms has turned sharply downward, putting enormous pressure on newcomers.

】

item.title: 道明银行贷款损失准备金低于预期，业绩超出预期
item.description: 多伦多多米尼克银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）尽管担心美国关税会阻碍经济增长，但为变质贷款预留的资金少于预期，因而超出了预期。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank beat estimates after setting aside less money than expected for souring loans, despite concerns that US tariffs will hamper economic growth.】

item.title: 南非将为 Transnet 提供 28 亿美元担保
item.description: 经财政部长同意，南非交通部同意向陷入困境的南非铁路和港口运营商 Transnet SOC 有限公司提供 510 亿兰特（约合 28 亿美元）的担保贷款。【原文：South Africa’s transport ministry with the concurrence of the minister of finance agreed to provide a 51 billion-rand ($2.8 billion) guarantee facility to Transnet SOC Ltd., the nation’s beleaguered rail and ports operator.】

item.title: 德国央行支持延迟欧洲贷款人交易规则
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）表示，欧洲应推迟针对银行交易业务的新的全球资本要求，并可能最终考虑对其进行永久性修改。【原文：Germany’s Bundesbank said Europe should delay new global capital requirements for banks’ trading businesses and could eventually consider permanent changes to them.】

item.title: 碧桂园债务计划获近 75% 债券持有人支持
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. has secured backing from nearly 75% of bondholders for its offshore restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter, ahead of a liquidation hearing next week.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州警告：美国最大油田面临毒水泄漏风险
item.description:
二叠纪盆地的废水处理正在增加地下压力，有可能阻碍石油生产

。【原文：

Wastewater disposal in the Permian Basin is boosting pressure underground, threatening to hinder oil production

】

item.title: 交易者涉足现货与期货合二为一的外汇市场
item.description: 货币交易商开始使用 "隐含价格"，将现货市场和期货市场的买卖双方联系起来，为缓解该行业的分散性做出了新的努力。【原文：Currency traders are starting to use “implied prices” that connect buyers and sellers from the cash and futures markets, in a new effort to ease fragmentation in the industry.】

item.title: 德国工资增长大幅放缓，经济增长举步维艰
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）表示，德国的工资增长已明显放缓，经济疲软表明未来的交易可能会比过去低得多。【原文：German wage growth has eased significantly, and economic weakness suggests future deals will likely be much lower than in the past, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 莱昂-布莱克之子期待在华盛顿证明自己
item.description: 本-布莱克没有在华盛顿工作的正式经历，在华尔街的履历也很有限。然而，这位亿万富翁阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Ben Black has no formal experience working in Washington and a limited Wall Street resume. Yet the son of billionaire Apollo Global Management Inc. co-founder Leon Black is now set to run an agency with a growing role in White House policy — the US International Development Finance Corp.】

item.title: 比亚迪首次在欧洲击败特斯拉，销量激增 169
item.description: 比亚迪公司在欧洲的电动汽车销量首次超过了特斯拉公司，超越了长期引领欧洲电动汽车市场的美国品牌。【原文：BYD Co. sold more electric vehicles in Europe than Tesla Inc. for the first time, overtaking the American brand that’s long led the continent’s EV segment.】

item.title: 大亨贝拉的公司获得五年来最便宜的卢比债券交易
item.description: 格拉西姆工业有限公司（Grasim Industries Ltd.）获得了自 2020 年 6 月以来成本最低的本币债券，这表明降息和印度央行最近注入的现金正在使企业受益。【原文：Grasim Industries Ltd. has secured its lowest-cost local-currency bond since June 2020, a sign that interest rate cuts and recent cash infusions by the Indian central bank are benefiting companies.】

item.title: 华尔街押注对冲交易，消费者优于住房需求
item.description: 随着美股投资者将注意力从缓和的贸易紧张局势转移到债券收益率上升的威胁上，华尔街两大交易平台建议从这两方面入手。【原文：As investors in US stocks shift their attention from easing trade tensions to the threat of rising bond yields, two big Wall Street trading desks recommend taking advantage of both.】

item.title: 中东资金缺口有可能推迟初创企业的上市雄心
item.description: 风险投资公司 Global Ventures 的创始人努尔-斯维德（Noor Sweid）表示，由于试图扩大规模的公司缺乏资金，中东地区的初创企业有可能失去发展动力，并面临更长的上市之路。【原文：Startups in the Middle East are at risk of losing momentum and facing a longer path to public listings due to a lack of funding for firms trying to scale, according to Noor Sweid, founder of venture capital firm Global Ventures.】

item.title: 债券投资者投票反对特朗普的大型税收法案
item.description:
30年期国债收益率触及两年来最高点

The yield on the 30-year Treasury touched the highest in two years

】

item.title: 巴菲特的继任者阿贝尔会见日本贸易公司
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）下一任首席执行官格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）本周在东京会见了日本最大的贸易公司，这进一步表明该公司致力于持有这些公司的股票。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway’s next chief executive Greg Abel met with Japan’s biggest trading houses this week in Tokyo, adding to signs the company is committed to holding their shares.】

item.title: 日本最大商业游说团体报告加薪幅度超过 5
item.description: 日本最高级别的商业游说团体报告称，其下属公司的工人连续第二年赢得了加薪超过 5%的承诺，这一结果表明，在日益恶化的劳动力紧缺状况的推动下，工资增长势头依然强劲。【原文：Japan’s top business lobby reported that workers at affiliated companies won pledges for pay hikes exceeding 5% for a second consecutive year, an outcome that points to continued momentum in wage increases fueled by the worsening labor crunch.】

item.title: 欧洲杯决赛失利后曼联股价下滑
item.description: 曼联足球俱乐部在欧洲杯决赛中不敌英格兰劲旅托特纳姆热刺队（Tottenham Hotspur），其股价将创下八个多月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Manchester United Plc shares are set for their steepest drop in more than eight months after the football club lost an all-or-nothing Europa League final against English rival Tottenham Hotspur.】

item.title: 美国进口商面临关税期限和海关稽查的 "紧要关头
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统暂停征收更高关税的同时，美国企业正面临着越来越大的进口货物压力，他们同时还要应对货物过境时日益复杂的申报规则。【原文：US businesses are under mounting pressure to import goods while President Donald Trump’s higher tariffs are on pause, and they’re simultaneously navigating increasingly complex filing rules when their cargo crosses the border.】

item.title: 特朗普电影关税计划抢走戛纳电影节风头
item.description: 匈牙利电影学院在戛纳电影节的展台上摆放着一本光鲜亮丽的小册子，宣传布达佩斯郊区的一个电影制片厂。在一个模拟的中世纪村庄旁边，有一片木板房群，被描述为 "美国郊区"。这个片场曾被用于拍摄美国制作的电影，如环球公司 2022 年的恐怖喜剧《蒙斯特一家》，而拍摄成本仅为好莱坞的几分之一。【原文：The Hungarian film institute’s booth at the Cannes Film Festival has a glossy brochure promoting a studio complex on the outskirts of Budapest. Next to a mock medieval village, it has a cluster of wood-paneled houses described as an “American suburb.” The set has been used to shoot US productions like Universal’s 2022 horror comedy The Munsters at a fraction of what it would cost to make in Hollywood.】

item.title: 追踪被劫持的汽车有助于造就新的非洲亿万富翁
item.description: 二十年前，扎克-卡利斯托（Zak Calisto）的公司开始在南非帮助劫车受害者找回车辆。如今，公司已发展成为一家国际追踪巨头，并在纽约上市，他也因此成为非洲最新的亿万富翁。【原文：Zak Calisto’s firm started out helping carjack victims recover their vehicles in South Africa two decades ago. It’s since expanded to an international track-and-trace giant with a New York listing — and made him Africa’s newest billionaire.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长武契奇称通胀率正缓慢向 2% 目标靠拢
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，消费价格增长正朝着 2% 的目标迈进。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Boris Vujcic said consumer-price growth is heading toward the 2% goal.】

item.title: 阿达尼港口公司从星展银行获得约 1.5 亿美元贷款用于资本建设
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼港口及经济特区有限公司通过与星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）签订双边贷款协议筹集了约 1.5 亿美元资金，这家印度企业集团正在继续恢复贷款人的信心。【原文：Adani Ports & Special Economic Zone Ltd. raised about $150 million through a bilateral loan agreement with DBS Group Holdings Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, as the Indian conglomerate continues to restore lender confidence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟认为中美贸易争端有助于澳大利亚企业发展
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，澳大利亚铁矿石开采商、钢铁制造商和其他企业在中美贸易裂痕中看到了潜在的机遇，许多企业对前景持乐观态度。【原文：Australian iron ore miners, steelmakers and other firms see potential opportunities in the US-China trade rift, with many upbeat about the outlook, according to Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser.】

item.title: 英国制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，美国关税冲击下英国私营部门再次萎缩
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施打击了海外需求，英国私营企业在 5 月份再次出现萎缩，这加剧了政府与美国贸易协议之间的利害关系。【原文：The UK private sector contracted again in May as Donald Trump’s tariffs hit demand from abroad, according to a closely watched survey, raising the stakes for the government’s US trade deal.】

item.title: 英镑飙升后，英国公司竞相修复货币对冲功能
item.description: 英镑飙升和全球货币波动促使英国董事会开始关注外汇风险。【原文：A surge in the pound and global currency volatility are driving a focus on foreign-exchange risk across Britain’s boardrooms.】

item.title: Qinetiq 看准北约盟国将成为英国国防公司发展的支点
item.description: 英国国防技术公司 Qinetiq Group Plc 计划更多地向北约盟国倾斜，以促进业务发展，因为各国政府都在增加开支，以保卫北约的东翼。【原文：Qinetiq Group Plc, the UK defense technology company, plans to pivot more to NATO allies to boost business as governments ramp up spending to defend the alliance’s Eastern flank.】

item.title: 贸易担忧缓解，德国企业预期改善
item.description: 由于对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的担忧有所缓解，加上公共支出即将增加，德国企业的经济前景有所改善。【原文：German companies’ economic outlook improved as concern over President Donald Trump’s trade policy eased and an imminent boost to public spending buoyed sentiment.】
